text: un assails vatican over sex abuse new
york's wintry mess and an international
yogurt feud good evening this is the new
york times minute the Holy See has
consistently placed the preservation of
the reputation of the church and the
protection of the perpetrators above
children's best interests a United
Nations panel ordered the Vatican today
to remove all priests known or suspected
of sexual abuse and report them to civil
authorities the Vatican says that will
study the panel's findings but the order
is non-binding in New York it's been a
miserable winner for the one on call
when it snows retiring sanitation
Commissioner John Doherty he agreed to
work one more winter but now with more
storms likely there's a potential salt
shortage mayor de Blasio says supplies
are fine plus he has his shovel and an
international feud over yogurt the
Russians are apparently blocking a
chobani shipment from reaching us
olympians and so cheap US politicians
intervened but the Russians say the
yogurt needs customs papers to fly
